page.title: 04The Barrs Family.
page.content: My name is Graham and I am 12 years old.In our family there are five people:Dad & Mum, my two brothers and myself.We have two pets: Sandy, our dog,and Tottenham,our rabbit. My dad has black hair and light brown skin.His height is around 1 metre eighty.His occupation is a Prison Officer and he works in Springhill Prison.My Mum has brownish hair and she used to have pale skin.Her height is around 1 metre sixty-two.She works as a secretary for Taylor Wayne Wright Drills. My oldest brother is 16.He has brown hair & light brown skin.He works at the Aylesbury Tesco as a cashier. My other brother is 14 & he has brownish hair & light brown skin.He is still at school.
